hackathon-description-text: This is the challenge site for the Hanoi locus of the dual-city Hackathon 2014 organized by Formation 8. There is a second location in Ho Chi Minh City.
hackathon-eligibility:
Any student, developer or technology enthusiast in Vietnam who can travel to Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh City on the day of the hackathon.
Teams may comprise of no more than 4 members.
hackathon-requirements: Submissions should attempt to follow one of the following themes:
hackathon-rules:
Apply by July 15th on the hackathon website.
Rules and Judging Criteria can be found on the hackathon website here:
http://www.hackathonvietnam.com/details
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Số 1 Đại Cồ Việt, Bách Khoa, Hai Bà Trưng, Hanoi, Vietnam

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: 1) Importance of the problem 2) Applicability and topic development 3) Large scale application
1) Novelty of idea 2) Novelty of approach 3) Novelty of design
1) Potential for creation to be a startup 2) Can it be immediately implemented 3) Creation meets the application requirements set out?
1) Team effectively presents creation in allotted time 2) Team expressed confidence while presenting 3) Team expressed an effective future strategy
1) Do similar products exist? 2) Is the product intuitive, clear and understandable?
1) Does the product address a current need? 2) Is the product a necessity for the consumer? 3) Can the product improve everyday life for the consumer?

hackathon-location-address: Hanoi University of Science and Technology, Số 1 Đại Cồ Việt, Bách Khoa, Hai Bà Trưng, Hanoi, Vietnam
hackathon-description-header: Hackathon Vietnam @ Hanoi: Top Engineers, Leading Entrepreneurs, Premier Venture Capital
